name: Milk and Honey Shoes LLC
description: Operator of a women's footwear brand. The company allows women to design their own footwear online from the various designs offered that includes platform pumps, stilettos, pumps, flats, oxford heels, oxford flats, wedges, platform wedges, wedges, boots, moto boots, booties, ankle boots, platform sandals, sandals and flat sandals.
one_liner: Operator of a women's footwear brand. The company allows women to design their own footwear online from the various designs offered that includes platform pumps, stilettos, pumps, flats, oxford heels, oxford flats, wedges, platform wedges, wedges, boots, moto boots, booties, ankle boots, platform sandals, sandals and flat sandals.
